channel.title: Changing players damage
channel.description: How can i change players accuracy? so players could hit 0 more often, or how to change NPC defence bonus? And how can i change players defence in pvp? because when player uses special attack on other player it mostly hits 0-0

item.title: Changing players damage
item.dc:creator: @VestaPK VestaPK
item.description:
@VestaPK wrote:

Change stats on weapons / special hitDamage and tell them to level up defence.

Read full topic
